name: Im Alone? (EN)
description:
Im Alone is a short game about how our life can be if we keep a dark secret. Inside Alan Long's mind, you will have to collect clues to find the way out and make that hidden truth stop tormenting you.

This is the first videogame developed entirely by me in a 100% self-taught way.

I would appreciate any donation as support for future developments.

  • Mode: Single player.
  • Movement: WASD
  • E: Inspect / Read
  • Q: Collect
  • F : Turn on / off flashlight
  • Shift: Run
  • Mouse: Camera
  • C: View controls
